document.full_text: at least 120 were wounded as police and government loyalists tried to break up a rally in western yemen demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule, a doctor said on wednesday.
document.title: clashes in yemen protest wound at least 120: medic
lines_and_colors: at least 120 were wounded as police and government loyalists tried to break up a rally in western yemen demanding an end to president ali abdullah saleh's 32-year rule, a doctor said on wednesday.
